com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream

Class Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.upstream.Loader

  • public final class Loader
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the background loading of Loader.Loadables.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Loader.Listener
      Interface definition for a callback to be notified of Loader events.
      static interface  Loader.Loadable
      Interface definition of an object that can be loaded using a Loader.
      static class  Loader.UnexpectedLoaderException
      Thrown when an unexpected exception is encountered during loading.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Loader

        public Loader(java.lang.String threadName,
      Loader.Listener listener)
        Parameters:
        threadName - A name for the loader's thread.
        listener - A listener to invoke when state changes occur.

    • Method Detail

      • startLoading

        public void startLoading(Loader.Loadable loadable)
        Start loading a Loader.Loadable.

        A Loader instance can only load one Loader.Loadable at a time, and so this method must not be called when another load is in progress.

        Parameters:
        loadable - The Loader.Loadable to load.

      • isLoading

        public boolean isLoading()
        Whether the Loader is currently loading a Loader.Loadable.
        Returns:
        Whether the Loader is currently loading a Loader.Loadable.

      • cancelLoading

        public void cancelLoading()
        Cancels the current load.

        This method should only be called when a load is in progress.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases the Loader.

        This method should be called when the Loader is no longer required.
